nodes.text: Antares Draco's quarters were located on the Empire-in-exile's fortress world of Bastion and were the personal quarters of Antares Draco, the leader of the Imperial Knights. They included a bed, as well as a table surrounded on three sides by a bench. A window next to the table overlooked several tall buildings.

In 138 ABY, Emperor Roan Fel gave Draco three hours to devise a plan to rescue Princess Marasiah Fel, the woman he loved and the Emperor's daughter, from the Sith world of Korriban. Draco retired to his quarters and consulted the holocron of his former Master Eshkar Niin. His trusted friend and fellow Imperial Knight Ganner Krieg visited him at that time, and as the two sat at the table, Krieg advised Draco to master the anger he felt over Marasiah's capture by the Sith. Draco then recruited Krieg and the Jedi Knight Shado Vao for an infiltration of Korriban.

Antares Draco's quarters were introduced in the forty-ninth and penultimate issue of the comic series Star Wars: Legacy, which was written by John Ostrander, penciled by Jan Duursema, and released in June 2010.
